DOC.brief_title: Child Care Wellness Study Nutrition Physical Activity
DOC.detailed_description: The broad , long term goal develop reproducible nutrition physical activity intervention utilize child care consultant nutrition specialist reduce risk overweight among child regulate out-of-home child care . The objective : 1 . To train Child Care Health consultant ( CCHCs ) become specialist nutrition consultation child care increase daily consultation activity nutrition , physical activity , childhood overweight , 2 . To increase child care staff parental knowledge positive attitude toward provide healthy food , appropriate portion food , appropriate level physical activity young child out-of-home child care centers. , 3 . To strengthen child care center policy , procedure , practice behavior , regard provide healthy food , appropriate portion food , appropriate level physical activity young child out-of-home child care center , 4 . To improve dietary intake level physical activity , prevent increase overweight risk overweight determine body mass index among child out-of-home child care center .
DOC.criteria: In three geographical area ( NC , CA , CT ) , two pair communitybased child care center urban area Englishspeaking director , kitchen , 5060 child age 2 5 year , 35 % eligible subsidy . If randomly select child care center open case child abuse neglect .
